meanings.definition: Consisting of two parts or segments.
meanings.sent1: The flower was dimerous, with two identical petals.
meanings.sent2: The insect had dimerous wings, each pair perfectly matched.
meanings.sent3: The dimerous puzzle was so easy, even a child could solve it.
meanings.sent4: His dimerous personality made him both introverted and extroverted at the same time.
meanings.sent5: The dimerous design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: The dimerous leaves on the plant were perfectly aligned in twos.
meanings.sent2: The bird had dimerous feathers, each pair matching in color and size.
meanings.sent3: The dimerous socks were so cute, they looked like a pair of tiny shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her dimerous earrings sparkled like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The dimerous pattern on the fabric created a symmetrical and pleasing effect.
